March/April to the end of 
September the majority 
of	people	aged	five	years	
and above will probably 
obtain	sufficient	vitamin	
D from sunlight when 
they are outdoors. So you 
might choose not to take 
a vitamin D supplement 
during these months.  
 
If you have dark skin or 
always cover your skin, you 
may be at particular risk of 
vitamin	D	deficiency.	Talk	to	
your midwife or doctor if you
